description: This course is to introduce concepts of fuzzy set theory, fuzzy decision making models, fuzzy number ranking methods and theirs applications to management and/or business.

syllabus.zh:
(1)模糊集合
(2)語意變數及語意值
(3)模糊數
(4)模糊算數運算
(5)模糊數比序法
(6)模糊多準則決策
(7)模糊近似最佳解排序技術
(8)模糊線性規劃
(9)管理相關應用
(10)商業相關應用
syllabus.en:
(1) Fuzzy set
(2) Linguistic variable and values
(3) Fuzzy numbers
(4) Fuzzy arithmetic operations
(5) Fuzzy number ranking methods
(6) Fuzzy multiple criteria decision making
(7) Fuzzy technique for order preference by similarity to ideal solution
(8) Fuzzy linear programming
(9) Applications to management
(10) Applications to business

weeklySchedule:
week 1-2. Fuzzy sets
week 3-4. Linguistic variable, values and fuzzy numbers
week 5-7. Fuzzy arithmetic operations
week 8. Fuzzy number ranking methods
week 9. Midterm Exam week
week 10-11. Fuzzy number ranking methods
week 12-13. Fuzzy multiple criteria decision making
week 14-15. Fuzzy technique for order preference by similarity to ideal solution
week 16. Fuzzy linear programming (optional)
week 17. Applications to management and business
week 18. Final Exam week
referenceBooks: 1. H.-J. Zimmermann, Fuzzy set theory and its applications, Kluwer Academic Publishers 2001. 2. A. Kaufmann and M. M. Gupta,Introduction to Fuzzy Arithmetic: Theory and Application, VanNostrand Reinhold, New York, 1991.
rules: Course schedule, teaching materials, evaluation etc. may be adjusted upon students' learning performance.
